content.rendered:
Contract Vehicles

OSI Prime Contracts

  • ITES 3S: W52P1J-18-D-A128
  • DISA ENCORE III: HC102818D0031
  • DISA HaCC Sustainment Task Order
  • USASSI IT Customer Support Services
  • Power Control and Management Subsystem (PCMS)
  • DISA HaCC Infrastructure Line of Business
  • Cyber Security Services Provider

OSI Schedules and Contracts

  • GSA Schedule IT- 70 : GS-35F-0179Y
  • GSA 8(a) STARs III : 47QTCB21D0315
  • FAA efast: DTFAWA13A-00076
